entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @brianstelter What SCIENCE did @WHO use to tell the world there was NO HUMAN TRANSMISSION of COVID19?? NONE, it was a coverup for China and WHO needs to be held accountable for CRIMINAL behavior! Yet YOU defend them. Are you that far gone? Is your @POTUS hate that great?
